Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.15780876]human immunodeficiency virus type 1 (HIV-1):Inhibition of viral infection in Vero P4-CCR5 cells(IC50=28 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: exerts a selective activity on viral particles and disturbs their organization by breaking the viral membrane, leading to the exposure of HIV-1 core and its dissociation.

Literature.Title: The antimicrobial peptide dermaseptin S4 inhibits HIV-1 infectivity in vitro.
Literature.Author: Lorin C, Saidi H, Belaid A, Zairi A, Baleux F, Hocini H, Bélec L, Hani K, Tangy F.
